sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"> <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <business_calendar/> <condition/> <conditional>false</conditional> <entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time> <max_drift/> <name>UpdateDemoData</name> <offset/> <offset_type>0</offset_type> <run_as display_value="Tom Hauri">bd634f471baf6110c1ecdc61ab4bcbea</run_as> <run_as_tz/> <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth> <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek> <run_period/> <run_start>2023-10-19 22:00:00</run_start> <run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time> <run_type>once</run_type> <script><![CDATA[gs.error('tomtom test scheduled script is running'); var grConfig = new GlideRecord('x_snc_json_cfg_mgr_json_configuration'); grConfig.addEncodedQuery('numberSTARTSWITHOCFGDEMO'); grConfig.query(); while (grConfig.next()) { grConfig.update(); grConfig.update(); // Do what setForceUpdate(true) would do in global (don't ask!) } // if demo data]]></script> <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>tom.hauri</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-10-20 16:51:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>90f7c7fc1b82f110d5be777d8b4bcb54</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateDemoData</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="JSON Cfg Manager" source="x_snc_json_cfg_mgr">078e5ee297052110b434f5f3a253afb6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="JSON Cfg Manager">078e5ee297052110b434f5f3a253afb6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_90f7c7fc1b82f110d5be777d8b4bcb54</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>tom.hauri</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-21 16:00:38</sys_updated_on> <time_zone/> <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe> </sysauto_script> </record_update>
